title: Taking Jenny
description: Jenny is a typical housewife enjoying a nice glass of red and some rare, quality alone time. When the doorbell rings unexpectedly late that night, her life is turned upside down. Her sister's boyfriend is on her doorstep, and he has in his hands the means to destroy her idyllic suburban life. What's more he has no scruples or morals and will do anything to get what he wants, and what he wants is Jenny. This steamy short story will leave you panting for more and is the first part of the novel, "Duty Bound - The enslavement of Jenny". Warning: This story contains graphic language, erotic situations, rough sex, anal sex, oral sex, submission, humiliation and it is very much a story for adults (18+). All characters are aged over 18.Show More Show Less
author: Christina Palmer
